website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight pop-up tent that's super easy and quick to set up.
pros: Rear mesh pocket shelf is handy for keeping sunscreen out of the sand
Internal pockets can store personal items
cons: No privacy flaps on the windows

customer_reviews.title: ... sizes (this and the XL) and we are extremely happy with both
customer_reviews.text: We bought both sizes (this and the XL) and we are extremely happy with both. I have attached a side-by-side comparison for reference. We plan to use the XL for the beach and the smaller tent for things like local festivals and airshows.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great Sun Shelter, Very Easy to Setup and Take Down
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the Pacific Breeze EasyUp Beach Tent and was amazed with the product. It provided great protection from the sun but it was also really easy to set up and take down. Here is a quick video showing how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Gutner

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sun tent was a lifesaver when we took our 3 year old and 9 month old to the beach recently! It was super windy and this tent withstood the strong winds and kept all of us nice and shaded. It was super easy to set up, too. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Best beach tent money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for 4 years now and couldn’t be happier with it. I just snagged one of the supports and came online to buy a replacement. If it wasn’t for my clumsiness this would last us a few more years! I can’t express how happy we were with this tent. Super lightweight, easy to set up, easy to break down and best of all keeps us cool on those super hot days out here. I wish there was a larger version of this for camping! The way this easily snaps up and snaps down is a dream come true especially if you have kids pestering you for get in the water. 5 stars all day.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: No parts, no service
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice. Used it one or two days the first summer. The second summer it broke. It was only the third time we'd ever attempted to set it up. One of the fiberglass poles snapped in two. I'm not a rookie with outdoor gear, so this wasn't user error. The company has absolutely no means of selling repair parts or allowing for it to be sent back to be repaired by them. Use the heck out of it the first year (we didn't), then after the initial 12 month warranty expires, if it breaks, just throw it away. Not worth it and will not buy anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Silky Sam

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVED THIS PURCHASE for all of our Florida beach trips ...
customer_reviews.text: WE LOVED THIS PURCHASE for all of our Florida beach trips this spring! As a mom of a 2 year-old whose husband worked during the duration of our 6 week stay in Florida- I was easily able to carry this, a beach chair, and my toddler! That's saying something! This tent is lightweight, packs and unpacks in a matter of minutes, and provided excellent shade! Locking it in and taking it down takes a special touch and some muscle. But what a great tent! I liked the windows for a breeze and staking it down took 10 seconds... Definitely my favorite beach purchase this year!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Well had this tent about a year. I used it 4, maybe 5 times before two of the support rods snapped while I was taking it down. I didn't do anything different to take it down. I think the rods are just cheaply made. There was no way to fix it! I had to throw it in the trash on my walk back to the car from the sand. Disappointing! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Paige

customer_reviews.title: Golden retriever love
customer_reviews.text: The tent was delivered promptly. I was impressed by how easy it was to setup and take down. With the stakes and sand flaps the tent had great stability even on a breezy day. But what really sold me was that my Golden Retriever took to it immediately. She laid down in the middle of the tent in easy reach of her water dish. Of course that left little room for us but that was ok since we bought the tent to keep our dog comfortable and safe between her playing in the waves.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Kudon

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend, great lil tent, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome tent. Super easy and super light weight, stores pretty well back in bag. Wish I purchased this sooner, two years in a row I bought a sportBrella. Same result each time. A few uses and the main post bent. The rods on this tent are really well-built,lightweight, and thin but strong enough to be quality for a great price! it's made very well!
customer_reviews.author: kevrock1

customer_reviews.title: Beach Tent
customer_reviews.text: It was actually really easy to put up. I took it to the beach and it worked great. Granted, a couple of nearby guys came over and helped me get it stabilized cause it was windy out and I was by myself with my toddler, but otherwise, once it was in place, it was great. I like the pockets on the inside of the tent and kept my phone in there to keep it out of the sun. The spikes did a great job of keeping the tent in place and I had them in kinda loose beach sand and it was really breezy. It was definitely worth getting. It's also very easy to carry around too.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Steffy

customer_reviews.title: Best beach tent!
customer_reviews.text: Did not break on the beach. I think that by itself deserves some stars. I've used different tents in the past, and the wind would prevent it being set up or it would break something by the end of the trip. This tent was extremely easy to set up. You just open it kind of like an umbrella. There's little mesh pocket inside where you can store some things, and also two little windows that you can keep closed if you want. My baby took a few naps in there and this prevented sand blowing on her face and the window allowed enough breeze inside. A wonderful purchase. would recommend to anyone thinking about getting one.
customer_reviews.author: SuziTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It catches everybody’s attention!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love arriving to the beach and building my tent in less than 5 seconds. I always hear someone in the back saying “wow! We need one of those”. The unfolding process is a little bit more tricky, but you get the hang of it. My advice don’t overfilled the sand bags unless it’s very windy. It’s a pain in the a** when you have to throw all the sand away, specially if you are like me and filled every single bag. It’s fits 2 people and a dog. I just love it. It gives you great privacy and a great shade for pets. Definitely a good investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one season
customer_reviews.text: Our beach tent was used for one beach season (maybe 3 times) and was stored appropriately. We went to set it up this year and one of the rods snapped right in the middle and now it’s not functional.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Pellant

customer_reviews.title: Beachy Keen
customer_reviews.text: Best beach item I own. Have had it since 2018. Only now writing a review because COVID-19 and I’m bored out of my skull. I do love it though, easy to set up and easy to break down. Best for one to two people, three is asking for a tight squeeze. Protects you from the sun and has little windows with covers you can either roll up or Velcro down.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, well made but really too small for adults.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sturdy, easy to set up and take down and provides shade and wind protection. on the negative, this is too small for two average size adults especially if you have a medium sized beach chair. I wish I had done some measuring and maybe set up a mock-up because you can only use a very small beach chair or a beach mat due to the height and with two of us in it out it in the sun it becomes very hot due to the lack of a breeze through the tent. The screen openings are well constructed but small. Will have to get the larger model because this just won't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Krieg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Set it up inside my house as a trial run and it was awesome! Took it to the beach on a windy day and YEAH RIGHT, there was no opening this tent. 3 of us were trying to set it up and never happened. I will try again one day, but for now the beach days are gone and for the price i never got to use it- that was upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Easiest set up ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted something easy to set up. This is REALLY easy to set up. My husband called it idiot proof. He set it up and took it down without having the directions, and generally he's not very patient about figuring out stuff like that. 4 stars because it's a little low to the ground, so sitting in one of those low beach chairs is possible, but just. The vents on the side are nice to help keep it a bit cooler, but it still gets pretty hot inside of it. Definitely not big enough for more than a couple of people to keep your heads shaded.
customer_reviews.author: Mom 20007

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed
customer_reviews.text: The poles very easily go through the tent fabric, making it completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: We take this tent everywhere!! It is so lightweight, and incredibly easy to set up. It literally just pops up, you stick the spikes in the corners and that’s it. Sometimes we don’t even use the spikes, as our stuff just holds it down. It is plenty large enough for me, my husband and my son to sit and relax in (with room to spare). We really really love this product, and have used it at the beach, river, or even just out in our yard playing. Yes, you can find cheaper versions, but you won’t find one that is so easy to set up and take down. Save yourself the frustration and just buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: JGriffin

customer_reviews.title: It's a "breeze" to put up!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design. The fact it has a floor. Simple to pop up and down. Made well. Looks awesome! Has to Side screened windows and inside storage pocket. Has outside pockets in which to place rocks or sand to weigh down in winds up to 35mph. Able to set up on beaches(allowed) as only 3 sided. Also comes with stakes and carrying bag. About 4.5 lbs to carry. Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken and Used
customer_reviews.text: Well, I want to love this one. When my new one gets here I’m sure and will update my review. I mostly just want to say to the jerk that took theirs to the beach, broke it, returned it covered in sand, and then tricked Amazon into selling it under “new buy damaged box. In orig packaging” you’re a loser. Thank God we opened this days before we are about to take our two little girls to the beach. It was covered in sand. Broken. Wouldn’t pop up. And clearly used. Shame on you for trying to pass it on to someone else. About to order again brand new and hoping for the best on our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Loved but then it broke in a light wind
customer_reviews.text: We loved this tent. We used it on 2 beach trips, no issues, easy to set up, lightweight and worked perfectly for protection for our toddlers, who even took great naps in it! Then a light breeze came and one of the main poles snapped. It is not salvageable and is no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Jokris10

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase. Easy set up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: Goes up and comes down super easy and provides a nice little shade on the beach. Makes it easier to spend more time on the beach when you aren't sitting in direct sunlight the whole time. Seems obvious, but took years to learn. I never wanted to mess with putting up a tent or any umbrella, but it really is simple with this tent. It even went back in the bag easily after take down. Even though we only do one beach trip per year, I expect we will probably throw this up at the park or other outdoor events this summer. Satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and my 13 month old and dog also love it. Since covid-19 has impacted our camping plans with this item we have improvised by popping it up in the living room on rainy days and in the backyard on nice ones. Despite not being able to doing one handed with a toddler-on-hip, it is super easy and fast to pop up and take down, even for someone under 5’1”.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Graves

customer_reviews.title: Pole snapped; threw it away.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this tent was great until the pole snapped after 1 year. You have to go to war with the pole when attempting to make the tent collapse. I can’t believe I spent $70 on this temporary tent. The poles need to be made out of better quality or the collapse feature must be made easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lale Haddadian

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a great beach tent
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. It is lightweight, easy to assemble, and easy to break-down and pack up. I bring a compact chair, and it makes for a good day at the beach. My chair sits a bit high since it swivels.  Things might get a little tight for two people, but it should work alright. I was worried that the chairs legs would puncture the floor of the tent, but so far that has not been the case. The tent is very well made and designed well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: It really is as good as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Meets and exceeds expectations! Easy up? So easy that it surprised me! I've had umbrellas that were more trouble to put up! My wife even commended me on this purchase. Shelter was delivered as promised (by Amazon), packaging was great, shelter was exactly as described on web site, all parts were there, and it really operated as described. Just the right size for two adults. If your group is bigger, suggest you get the larger shelter. Appears to be durable if not abused. Comes with complete instructions (and pictures) that are attached to the storage bag. No paper booklet that invariably blows away at the beach. I look forward to years of use!
customer_reviews.author: Swamp

customer_reviews.title: Great light easy to set up beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Very solid tent. Loving this and it absolutely does set up in seconds and quite sturdy. Only question is if the material, which is rather thin, will hold up - so taking a star off for that aspect of the construction. Super light weight though. Also like the window screens on the side for ventilation. Will never mess with an umbrella again. Took this photo at the beach today - this is how you can tell it’s a best-seller. There were countless more on the beach and this photo doesn’t include our tent.
customer_reviews.author: S. Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for going to the beach with kids.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! I have a baby and I live in Florida, we go to the beach almost every weekend and this has been a life saver for me. Perfect for taking a nap, protecting the baby for sun and changing time. Very sturdy, lightweight and easy to assembling once you understand how it works. Already recommended to my friends and family. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yarelis

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy to carry to beach or elsewhere. Ridiculously easy to set up and break down. I like that it has pouches that you can fill with sand or rocks to keep it from blowing away, or you have the option of staking it down. We put a couple low beach chairs in it and there is room for a small pack between the chairs and a larger pack behind the chairs in the back of the tent. My wife and I both have fair skin and are supposed to stay out of the sun, so with this we have made it to the beach a lot more this summer and it's been wonderful. Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TRG from the Northeast

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up & won’t blow away!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these because our friends had lent us theirs and we loved it! Actually the first time we took it to the beach, a man approached us saying he saw us put it up super easily and his wife made him come ask where we had purchased it! My friends have had theirs over a year and have used it several times, we live super close to the beach so go frequently. We just got ours but have confidence it will last, it holds up in the wind. We LOVE it. When we come home we spray it down with fresh water and let it dry before storing for the next time!
customer_reviews.author: Doria G. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Tent is good, but much smaller than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: Setup and take down is super easy - quality seems pretty good. The problem is that the tent is small and you can't put two chair in there. The test is a hemisphere shape, so you don't get as much coverage from the sun, and it's really hot on the inside in the sun. I would not recommend as a good beach solution.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Like the name says...
customer_reviews.text: After struggling to manage a different beach tent, we purchased this one based on its reviews and videos, and we were not disappointed! It is super lightweight and SO easy to set up, move around, and take down. For such a light tent, it's also fairly sturdy and has some other nice features for enjoying a day at the beach. Next time around, I would consider buying the bigger-sized version of this tent since it's pretty cozy with 2 people sitting inside of it on small Tommy Bahama beach chairs. But for a first-time Pacific Breeze purchase, the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeCat9

customer_reviews.title: Only takes seconds to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 month for our first time at the beach with him. Super easy to set up and fold back up. I didn’t even need to look at the instructions. The sun protection was perfect. Might be too small if you’re looking for something to work for adults, though. There are 4 points at which you stake the tent into the ground/sand (which are included). When it’s windy, I think more contact points would have been helpful but overall I’d recommend this in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: JoeH

customer_reviews.title: A little trouble, but a very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for us on windy Florida beaches. You really have to pack sand into the pouches, though. I'm a tall person and I could lay down with about 3/4 of me shaded by the tent. I managed to set it up by myself while also trying to wrangle my child, but the pop-up portion was a little complicated at first, and folding it up on a windy beach was difficult. I'm sure with multiple uses, it would get easier to put up and take down, though. Overall, very pleased with the purchases, and especially liked the pouch and sling which made it easier to travel with than another brand I considered which collapses into a large circle.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGrl

customer_reviews.title: Like the name... it's a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest tents we've had to set up and put away for our beach trips. It's a good size for 2 adults and 1 child. It's nice that the front is open but it does provide good shade from the other 3 sides, and there is mesh windows to allow for some breeze (and so your tent doesn't blow away). It has pockets to fill with sand as well as anchors for your tent to stay in place. The blue color is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Filip P.

customer_reviews.title: A nice sized sun shade
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sunshade for the beach, although it is a little too large to bring to the public pool with us. It goes up very quickly once you get the hang of it. Unfortunately, it is much more difficult (and time-consuming) to get back in the bag! It comes down easily, but there is so much loose fabric, it is hard to roll up. It is useful to have two people to help put it away. We had problems getting all the sand off the tarp floor, too. It provides a nice amount of shade for our family of three, and seems to be well-made. We had people on the beach stop and ask us about it.
customer_reviews.author: Risapea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this beach tent for over 3 years! This has held up extremely well and still going strong! I can’t believe I’m only now adding this review. It’s such an easy set up. Just pop it up and you’re done! While I’m relaxing in my tent there’s other people still struggling putting their tent up. There has been no tears, rust, or any damages for all the years I’ve been using this. That means great strong quality! Love this! Wouldn’t hesitate to buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for our beach trips. This tent is light weight and absolutely easy to pop into place. Literally took me less then a minute to assemble. Our beach trip with this tent decreased our sun rays and temp by a good 15 degrees! (It felt like anyway) We added a small portable fan and honestly couldn’t have had a better camp out on the beach. The kids loved sitting inside eating their snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandson ! First time to the beach! Very easy to use! My family loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina boerger

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Beach Tent based on the fact that Amazon recommended it as "Top Rated". The first day I used it on a moderately windy day at the beach, one of the posts broke (due to the wind). The tent now rendered useless as the pole can't be replaced. I tried to return it but didn't realize the RMA has an expiration on it which I missed. Now it can't be re the returned. Not pleased with return policy.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent but I’d recommend getting bigger one
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for mom or dad and baby . You have to make sure you catch the wind with it if it’s windy . But other then that it was small enough and enough shade . It was cracking me up Somone at beach had one of those tents you have too put together and they looked at me with mine and I was like mine just pops up lol overall this is a great tent but I would recommend getting the bigger one for sure
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw and build quality issues
customer_reviews.text: The good: Single pull to deploy is really nice. Size is nice for two people to sit (not enough room for chairs, though). Very light. Sand pockets allow you to weigh it down. The bad: One of the skeleton attachment points ripped the second time I used it. Completely unusable in the wing because the joints of the skeleton fold inwards and allow the tent to collapse. The detents aren't nearly stiff enough to withstand any kind of wind, even with the windows open to let the air move through the tent wall.
customer_reviews.author: thom's brain

customer_reviews.title: So simple.  So perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on all of the amazing reviews. I just opened and set it up in my living room and it took me a total of five mins and without Instructions (didn’t see them in the bag until it was already up). So simple, feels like good quality, and convenient! Purchased it for dog beach to provide shade for us and the pups. But it’ll be used for so much more with how little room it’ll take in the car and how easy it is to set up. So happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Salcido

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and great for sports and summer season.
customer_reviews.text: It is very big and I opted for the regular instead of the XL or extended floor. I figured it would be more I would have to shove in the carrying sack. Great choice to go with the regular. It fits a lot. Using it for soccer and beach. My 4 kids fit great. I would compare it to an oblonged shaped full size bed. The poles are very sturdy and held in place by a net so no need to make adjustments. Also folds down very easy and fast when you gotta get going in a hurry. I think the XL would have been to big for us. Love that the windows have velcro to hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pacific Breeze Easy Setup Beach Tent
customer_reviews.text: Love this beach tent! It is super light and talk about easy to set up! It literally takes a minute! My husband, the three dogs and I loved it! When you're carrying all your beach gear and have dogs on leashes you don't want to carry a cumbersome beach tent but you need one to give the pups and yourself a break from the sun. It was really nice! We had another brand that we had for about 6 years but unfortunately a big gust of wind caught it last summer and tore the tent from the stake. It was very roomy and nice but it was heavy. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: pweise

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Easy little Tent
customer_reviews.text: This little tent is awesome. Used is several times already this summer and it is truly "easy up/down". Takes a couple of minutes to pop it up/down. Hardest part is keeping track of the little bag that holds the stakes! LOL Putting it back into the carrying bag is doable with just one person but it helps having two people do it. It's light-weight but so far hasn't flown off - the stakes keep it anchored pretty well. The tent kept us & our belongings dry during a brief shower moving through. It's not fully water proof but as long as you don't touch the walls where the flaps/openings are at you'll stay pretty dry. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Some Blue Devil

customer_reviews.title: Great for the soccer sidelines!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used this tent outside yet. We bought it for soccer tournaments for the upcoming season. However, we did put it up to see if it was as easy as the reviews claim. Let me tell you, it is even easier! Taking it down was also so easy my 12 year old could do it. The size was perfect for our non-soccer playing children to relax inside. I liked how the bag was roomy for everything to fit back inside (with extra space) and how the directions were on a tag the was sewn right on the bag. Great product. I will update this once our season starts in a couple of weeks. So far... very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Don't be THAT guy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tent! We watched some poor guy break down his tent for over a half hour the other day at the beach. With this tent, YOU WILL NOT BE THAT GUY! This tent takes all of a minute to put up and a minute to take down. It's got pockets all around that you can fill with sand to keep it from blowing away. It comes with spikes as well, but they aren't necessary at the beach. It's large enough to fit 2 adults (and a child) sitting upright - no need to duck. If you open flaps on either side, you get a very nice cross breeze. Very well made. We couldn't be happier with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JenM

customer_reviews.title: Such an Easy tent!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this tent as we live on the coast and have kids. We wanted to have a shady spot and umbrellas are too much work. This tent is easy to open, you just pull the cords and it pops. The take down is equally as easy, the bag has instructions printed on it. I'm fairly short, about 5'0" and I have no issues opening or collapsing it. We've used about 4 times and we're happy we purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: carofunny

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Beach Tent for One Person setup.
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST and EASIEST Beach Tent I have ever used. It only takes one person to open and close it. Extremely easy to use and store. I love it and would recommend it to everyone. A great way to spend all day at the beach and not have to worry about finding shade. The windows let the breeze go through the tent ad helps you stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: We loved how easy this tent is to set up. Our beach experience was enhanced with this tent. The wind was swirling the sand around, but our beach tent stayed in place with the sand pockets filled with sand at each corner. We never wondered if it was going to blow away like our beach umbrella would have. The side window vents are great, we just wish it had a window vent at the back. This is the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. Otherwise, the beach tent performed exactly as stated in the promotion. It worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the reviewers- this tent is super simple and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: For our first beach trip with our 1.5 year old, I geared up with all of the necessary sun protection, this beach tent being one of the most important purchases. As all the reviewers have noted, this umbrella fold tent is super easy to set up and put away, and is very lightweight. We didn't have to weigh it down at all and it stayed put and seemed very stable. We will definitely pack this every time we go to the beach, and also to the park for a picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Sven5000

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is PERFECTION for the beach. So glad we paid a little more for this brand and size. It’s a BREEZE to set up and so useful for staying out of the sun. We plan on taking it to outdoor concerts and for the backyard. Would HIGHLY recommend. The video of setup is really helpful and you should only need one person to set it up. I set it up while our infant was in a wearable carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up but could be a bit larger.
customer_reviews.text: This tent was easy up as advertised. Setting up was a... well breeze. We did have difficulty getting it back into the bag, but that could be just as easily blamed on the wind coming off the Atlantic. The floor of the tent is a little thin but it’s not a problem. I’m a tall man 6’4” so the inside was a bit cramped for me. It is only realistically usable for two people with maybe room for one child. All in all worth the money
customer_reviews.author: johnhigg64

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I Expected and Needed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days as promised and was exactly what I expected and needed. Very light easy to transport in the carry bag with shoulder strap. Slightly confusing to put up and take down the first time, but the second time was a "breeze". Although as a 4'11" woman, I am not certain that I could do it alone. Still not certain aboit folding it so it fits back easily in the bag. That could be easier. But I hope to figure it out. Comfortablely fits two people on beach chairs. Has good air flow and I like that it as the option to close the windows for privacy or to block the wind.
customer_reviews.author: KulalaniCouple

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quick shelter
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t gotten to take this to the beach yet but we opened it at home to check it out. It was easy to open and close, provided plenty of room for our family of 4 (kids age 3 yrs & 10 months) with window flaps you can open or close if it’s windy. I’m very excited to use this next time with the baby while the oldest plays in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to set up, but unfortunately the poles aren’t very strong when you take it down. Both my friend and I purchased one of these and after a handful of uses, the side pole snapped in half. I would not recommend buying this product bc this seems to be a reoccurring theme with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, protection, easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay and the ease of set up, it is totally worth it! So light to carry to and from the oceanfront. Simple setup. No holes or tears for a full 7 day consecutive use. Held up really well during the high gust winds that blew. Spacious for two adults and toddler. The only improvement I would have enjoyed was a third ventilation screen on the very backside. I believe larger models offer this feature though - so definitely worth the splurge for better airflow inside. Otherwise, it can get a little stuffy/hot without a breeze while seeking shelter from the sun’s rays. But overall, highly recommend and so so pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim after battling with umbrellas in the past. This is so easy, quick and light. Great for beach. Love the pockets inside as well as flaps you can roll up to let breeze in. Also love the fact that once you roll it back up the bag is big enough for it to go back into without a huge hassle. May upgrade to the xl one day. For now this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: mombargainshopper

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for multiple beach trips now and it is stored in my basement in between. This continues to be a great buy. Easy for me to set-up and take down by myself, fold up, carry, etc. My baby napped in this with no problem. The only thing I recommend is to buy heavier stakes than the plastic ones it came with due to potential wind gusts. I use a heavier metal type.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great outdoor summer tent
customer_reviews.text: I loved the ease of operation... MUST HAVE! Child loved it... Padre Island was a great time especially with this tent. We knew we could turn it away from the sun and wind so we could play in the sand and still watch the baby! GREAT product. --- Had no sunburn problems --- No issues with repacking nor carrying --- Fits well in trunk of car --- Nice sun protection --- Strong wind protection

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little beach tent!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a nice light weight beach tent to take to the SoCal beach and saw this highly rated one. Great things about it: super lightweight, looks nice, windows on the side can be lowered to get the breeze so it doesn't feel like a sauna. The only critique, the stakes could be a bit longer for keeping it in place in the sand. Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Easy one-person set up
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny. We tried a cheaper alternative and it was a disaster. This tent is simple to set up with one person during a windy beach day. We did purchase longer metal stakes for the soft sand but overall this product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Killette

customer_reviews.title: Must have for beach and lake trips.
customer_reviews.text: We have only used it one time so far. We took it to the beach and it was so much easier to set up than our pop up canopy we usually take. I think we may buy another one because it was hard for all 4 of our family members to sit under it for shade at once. It was super easy to set up. Only took a few minutes to pop it in place and get it weighted down. My husband was very happy he didn’t have to lug the giant canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber J. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, easy to pop up,  weak poles though
customer_reviews.text: I like the set up of this tent a lot. I was disappointed it didn’t have some fabric to roll out out front of the tent to form a little patio. That’s ok and more or less clear from the photo. Anyway I’m giving it kind of a less favorable review because one of the tent pole s snapped on first use. I think it is lacking strength and durability.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy Beach Tent! If I had 5 thumbs -- they'd all be up!
customer_reviews.text: We took this on a cruise to use at the ports where we planned to spend the day at the beach. From being super lightweight to carry, to literally taking 2 seconds to setup, to the minute it took to collapse -- it was perfect! Great size -- has ability to roll up side pieces to have some air flow -- and the back pocket is handy for storing stuff up and out of the way. Pictured here with the "blanket" it's often sold with -- that's made of some type of woven plastic or something? Also awesome!
customer_reviews.author: L. Paschal

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Super easy up and down. Had it at the beach this weekend and it held up to 15 mph winds (slightly higher gusts). Good quality. Lightweight to carry. Just roomy enough for two people. Love the sandbag feature. My only complaint is that the flaps that cover the screen vents when you want to block the wind, don'y always stay closed, but that's not really a big deal. I guess I have a second complaint and that is it seems a bit overpriced, but it's definitely worth getting this one over the cheap models that are out there at the big boxes and online. Recommended. Four stars
customer_reviews.author: B Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent. Pro's Super light weight Easy to set up Easy to take down Great coverage Easy to clean Didn't blow away The only con I can think of is it would be nice if it had a zip up front so that I could keep my toddler inside. I really can't say enough about it, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: micsue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two adults in beach chairs plus a child ...
customer_reviews.text: Eas set up and down. Follow the directions inside the carrying bag, bring sure to lift tent a bit off the ground while pulling rope to open. Sandbags stand up to the wind. Includes stakes for stiff wind. Perfect for two adults in beach chairs plus a child plus cooler and stuff. It can get hot inside, so open the window flaps. Ditcheck the umbrella, this is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Gilstein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this tent after reading the very positive reviews online. Not only is it well made and reasonably priced, it performs excellently. We took our tent to Oceanside, OR yesterday for Father's Day and had a spectacular time at the beach. A large part of our enjoyment was the comfort we experienced from our tent. It handled some significant gusts with ease. The attached bags at the sides and rear of the tent allowed anchoring with heavy rocks and the tent stayed securely in place. Opening the side vents allowed air to flow through the unit to reduce pressure buildup from inside. This was an excellent aspect to the design also. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Farquar1000

customer_reviews.title: Quality built, easy to setup, but gets Hot inside.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the concept, certainly is easy-up (as a dad with small kids) i highly appreciate! Built with quality. Only reason for 4 stars is that even with the windows/screens open the sun does make it 5-10 degrees hotter inside the tent, stopped using it for beach (in 85-90 Deg weather) instead an umbrella which provides perfect air breeze circulation. This isn't the companies fault, just inherent in all tent designs to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeBlue

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set-up and breakdown! Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: After looking for something affordable, easy to use, and effective, I decided to buy this for our family beach trip, and was not disappointed. It was an easy 1 person set-up and take down item that was perfect to provide cover for our kids and easy to pack up and carry over our shoulder! Exactly as advertised, even though it was initially a little more than I wanted to spend.
customer_reviews.author: SaucyAmes

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something easy to carry down to the beach and easy to set up. This was absolutely perfect! The bag is lightweight, and the tent practically pops out itself. My 4-month-old enjoyed being outside because of it. I like how the tent has "windows" to let the breeze come through. I will definitely be using this time and time again, even when the kids are much older.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeUser

customer_reviews.title: Good beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and take down, good quality beach tent. Looked at many tents before getting this one and I’m glad I went with this one. It isn’t super great for ventilation even with the window flaps open. Kind of just like any other tent in the sun where it feels kinda warm and stagnant inside despite a breeze. It is plenty spacious with room for a baby and lots of stuff. Could easily fit at least one adult and a few small kids or two adults if no kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shut up and give them your money!
customer_reviews.text: Stop reading and just buy it already. it goes up in 20 seconds and that includes pulling it out of the bag. no more poles to putts around with in the wind. pop it open like an umbrella, fill the built in bags on the outside with sand or steak it down in the grass. this is the only thing that makes sense. unless you need something bigger but i think they make a bigger unit too.
customer_reviews.author: Dino P

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN ROD
customer_reviews.text: We used this for less than one summer, followed all instructions, and one of the rods snapped just like other reviewers have said. It's too flimsy for the amount of pressure that gets put on the rods when it pops up. I am not happy with this purchase and have contacted customer service with no response so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for our family of 5 to include a newborn. The side windows allow for a nice cross breeze but also like the feature to close the windows if too sunny. So far so good in handling the more breezy days at the beach. Proven better product than the one Costco is selling which I’ve owned in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Antonucci

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: This tent blew my mind. I'm pretty sure everyone on the trip was sick of me talking about how awesome it was. Hands down the BEST purchase I made for that trip. If you think it's a little expensive, get over it. It's not THAT expensive and it is totally worth every dollar for the convenience and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing. Took it on a recent trip to the beach over labor day and got many looks when I set this up and took it down. It is up and ready to use in less than 30 seconds. My wife and I laughed at the group of college kids behind us who fought with their tent for at least 5 minutes putting theirs together. The looks they gave me when we took ours down and put it in the bag in seconds was priceless. If you found this review helpful, please click “Yes” below. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JeremyW

customer_reviews.title: Fit My Needs Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Overall, excellent product. Kids and family are happy to have a tent at the beach to escape the sun. A little tricky at first on how to properly set-up and break down. I suggest a rehearsal BEFORE you head to beach + practice with caution. You don't want to over-muscle something. Oh yeah, far more lightweight than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Best pop up beach tent available
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to set up I can’t believe it. It just pops right up and back down. Sometimes it’s a little tricky to get back in the bag but once you get it started it slips right in. It’s a necessity for me now every time I hit the beach. It’s so roomy for one or two people! I’m going to get another one because my original one was lost.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my beach tent. As promised, it is a cinch to put up, even for a light-weight like me & just as easy to put back in its sheath. You know when you buy a product and try to put it back in the way it came out but it never goes in right? Well, no problem with this item. It's sturdy & held up to some pretty strong beach breezes. The vents on either side of the tent worked well with allowing the breeze through on a hot day. Kept my personal belongings inside when I went swimming & it was nice knowing they were hidden. I can't say enough positive things about this beach tent.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Broke twice in 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but poor execution. The posts that give the tent shape and structure can rotate/twist which is extremely bad when you're pulling the cables during set-up. Two different posts snapped in half. I'm a little guy (160lbs.) so I'm not going ape on this thing - just pay close attention that all the joints are aligned properly before pulling the cables, since they obviously don't self-align reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We live in FL, go to the beach frequently and I hate laying out - because I am a pasty semi-ginger. My fiance can lay in the sun for hours and not be bothered. I last about 15 min before wanting to get up and walk around. She bought this and I slept on the beach (out of the sun) for the first time in my life! It's great with our dogs too - they get too hot and curl up inside with me and a water bowl. Super lightweight, super east to set up & break down. With the windows open and positioned correctly it's airy and breezy.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Easy, easy, easy.
customer_reviews.text: This sun shade has been amazing! So lightweight, easy to carry and most important, so easy to set up!!! I get so many compliments on how easy this is to set up. I have two daughters under 4 and we take this thing everywhere! We set up at the park, lake, pool, backyard, parades, and camping. It’s been great to have a convenient tent to set up for some quick shade. Although if you’re a parent, i recommend taking an extra blanket to put on the floor for extra comfort and roll up the windows for some air ventilation. Just buy this, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Turner

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Opens in about 5 seconds by literally pulling a cord, and closes just as easily. No wrestling with poles or sleeved rods or anything. It's light, sturdy, and roomy enough for two people to lounge. Side vents unzip and tie to the side for light and ventilation when wanted. The whole thing rolls up into an easy-to-carry sleeve with a shoulder strap. This product was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deserves 10 * rating!!!  The absolute BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best items I've ever bought from Amazon (and I buy A LOT!!) This tent is light weight, comes in a handy carrying bag and is so easy to put up and take down. No pole to obstruct sitting underneath, room for two beach chairs plus more, pocket to hold small items (keys, wallet, wipes), 2 side windows for ventilation (roll up), full floor, SPF fabric. Can't say enough good things about this item! Watch the video on Pacific Breeze website and see how easy the set up and take down are - it really is as easy as shown!!
customer_reviews.author: Mooselady

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, fast to set up!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect at the beach and really holds up in the wind. My wife and I can set the tent up in under 5 minutes due to its clever design. The sand bags are a nice feature to help ad weight during windy days. Super lightweight and the included bag makes transporting a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for extending your beach time in the comfort of the shade!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up on the beach. The pockets inside came in handy for storing sunscreen, snacks, water and other small items. Most importantly, because my wife and I have a toddler, this extended our time at the beach by at least 2-3 hours. We didn't have to go home as people got too hot in the direct sun. Our son could go in here, in the comfort of the shade, and play with his toys while we extended our beach time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R. Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy assembly and breakdown
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tent. We live close by the beach but never could stay all day with two littles who need some shade. This is easy to put up/ take down, easy to pack up, big enough for our family of four and our belongings. Love the cute windows that let air flow in but can be closed for more sun protection or privacy. Love this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sun/shade solution.
customer_reviews.text: Usually either haul or rent an umbrella - this seemed (and was) a perfect solution. It set up quite easily. The attached bags were easy to fill and unlike an umbrella, I felt it was well anchored. For me, it took a bit of relocating myself so I wasn’t “in” the tent yet still in the shade. Loved it and recommend highly. I am in my 70’s, carried it to the beach and set it up myself.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great sun tent and super easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite Amazon purchases of all time. This tent takes about 10 seconds to set up and maybe 1 minute to take down. We bought it for the beach but we have ended up using it everywhere from the beach to soccer games to campouts in the living room. It blocks the sun and still allows considerably air flow through to keep you cool.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Solid tent
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tent, easy to setup and breakdown. Its lighter than my beach umbrella with only slightly more space. Sand pockets hold her down in pretty strong winds but you can use a steak for more hold. The stakes that come with it are useless though. The windows and pockets are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best and quickest shade shelter I ever owned!! Umbrellas in the sand are now a thing of the past. I also decided to buy 4 sand bag anchors so that I can just fill them up on the beach and clip them on the tent stake loops. The price, the quality, the easy set up, and the light weight design make this a 5 star product all the way around. This model is great for me and a friend but I am probably going to buy the XL model as well so we can fit the whole family when they come to visit! I am more then satisfied with this purchase..... I am amazed!!
customer_reviews.author: Drea K.

customer_reviews.title: light to carry and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Although we haven't used this at the beach yet due to Covid19 Sheltering orders we are using it in our son's room to make the indoors a little more fun. It was super easy to set up, seems durable and I can't wait to use it at a REAL beach one day! It's also very light which is really nice considering everything else you have to bring to the beach with a 5 year old :) I've seen other families at the beach with this exact model in the past and it did not look like it was something that was difficult to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: brigette

customer_reviews.title: Great little beach tent!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for two! Recently used this on a 96 degree beach day. It fit both of our beach chairs inside - No room for much else really, which is fine, everything else can go on the beach blanket. It really did provide excellent shade! There are even two panels on either size for allowing air flow. I forgot how hot it was until I stood outside the tent to go swimming. Easy to put up, and easy to take down (literally takes less than a minute). Much better than fussing with beach umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Why wouldn't you buy it?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. It is SOOOO easy to set up and take down 2. Stays put without the anchor 3. Definitely protects you from the sun. If you're Asian, you know you want it. 4. Everyone will be envious 5. You can hang your clothes at the top to dry 6. It's light Cons: 1. Random Russians will try to want to buy it from you at the beach for $20 less 2. The wrap around thing can be annoying 3. The Large can only provide nap space for 2 skinny people that's super short 4. Get the XL
customer_reviews.author: Lillith

customer_reviews.title: Return customer
customer_reviews.text: Second one I’ve bought. Easy to use. Good cover at the beach or for camping. Throw a backpack, cooler, or whatever in to keep it weighted down while your away and want to leave it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to setup and take down
customer_reviews.text: We took our 5 month old to the beach. This tent worked perfectly. Well made. Extremely easy to setup and take down. Very light and easy to carry in the provided bag. Used the sand pockets to secure the tent. It was very secure. I was not at all concerned about it blowing over or away. We purchased a small CGear Sand-Free Multimat blanket to place inside the floor of the tent. The sand filters through the mat and you do not have to worry about you or your kids sitting or laying in sand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pacific Breeze Easy Setup Beach Tent
product_meta.description: Style:Pacific Breeze Easy Setup Beach TentPacific Breeze Easy Setup Beach Tent
feature_bullets: Specially designed hub system showcases industry leading design. Allows for fast and easy setup

Lightweight, compact beach tent provides protection from the sun, rain and wind for all outdoor activities, UPF 50+ sun protection and large windows for ventilation. The beach tent is made from breathable polyester and is water repellent. weighing just 4.5 pounds and folds down to a travel size of 40 L x 5 W x 5 H

The tent is 87 L x 47 H x 49 D, providing a spacious interior shelter and has internal pockets to store personal items. Durable and lightweight fiberglass frame and water resistant PE floor makes the beach tent a great outdoor accessory
Includes a carrying case, sand pockets, and stakes
Pacific Breeze's customer friendly 1 year warranty. Call or email any time for support!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
